00007  *  Feedback on phase noise amplitude for LHC controlled longitudinal emittance
00008  *  blow-up using noise injection through cavity controller or phase loop.
00009  *  The feedback compares the FWHM bunch length of the bunch to a target value
00010  *  and scales the phase noise to keep the targeted value.
00011  *  Activate the feedback either by passing it in RFSectionParameters or in
00012  *  the PhaseLoop object.
00013  *  Update the noise amplitude scaling using track().
00014  *  Pass the bunch pattern (occupied bucket numbers from 0...h-1) in buckets
00015  *  for multi-bunch simulations; the feedback uses the average bunch length.
00016  *
00017  */
